title: Direction of magnetic force on electron near wire

content.prompt: Which of the following is true about the direction of the initial magnetic force acting on the electron due to the current in the wire?

choices.label: It is toward the top of the page.
It is toward the bottom of the page.
It has no direction because the magnitude of the initial magnetic force on the electron is zero.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
